pokebody.name: Damage Bind
pokebody.text: Each Pokemon that has any damage counters on it (both yours and your opponent's) can't use any Poke-Powers.

attack.name: Gigavolt
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage. If tails, the Defending Pokemon isnow Paralyzed.

attack.name: Reflect Energy
attack.text: Move an Energy card attached to Ampharos to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

pokepower.name: Dig Well
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck, choose as many {W} Energy cards as you like, and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. Discard the other cards. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Aqua Press
attack.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to all Pokemon (both yours andyour opponent's).

attack.name: Double Launcher
attack.text: Discard 2 {W} Energy attached to Blastoise. Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 60 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Blastoise can't use Double Launcher during your next turn.

pokepower.name: Fire Breath
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon. That Pokemon is now Burned. This power can't be used if Blaziken is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Clutch
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Fire Spin
attack.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Blaziken.

pokepower.name: Power Circulation
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for up to 2 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them on top of your deck in any order. If you do, put 2 damage counters on Delcatty. This power can't be used if Delcatty is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Power Heal
attack.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Delcatty. Then, remove 2 damage counters from Delcatty.

pokepower.name: Reverse Time
pokepower.text: Once during your turn, when you put Dialga from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your discard pile for up to 3 in any combination of Pokemon (excluding Pokemon LV.X) and basic Energy cards. Show them to your opponent and put them on top of your deck in any order.

attack.name: Time-Space Traveling
attack.text: Draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

pokebody.name: Time Aura
pokebody.text: As long as Dialga is your Active Pokemon, your opponent can't play any Pokemon from his or her hand to evolve his or her Active Pokemon.

attack.name: Metal Burn
attack.text: Discard all {M} Energy attached to Dialga.

attack.name: Deafen
attack.text: Your opponent can't play any Trainer cards or Stadium cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Second Strike
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon already has 2 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

pokepower.name: Psychic Connect
pokepower.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a {P} Energy attached to 1 of your Benched Pokemon to your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Gardevoir is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Energy Burst
attack.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Gardevoir and the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Psychic Protection
attack.text: Gardevoir has no Weakness during your opponent's next turn.

pokepower.name: Let Loose
pokepower.text: Once during your turn, when you put Giratina from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws up to 4 cards. (You draw your cards first.)

attack.name: Earth Power
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Over Slash
attack.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Dark Wing Flaps
attack.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

pokebody.name: Electric Barrier
pokebody.text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokemon (excluding any Manectric) by attacks.

attack.name: Power Wave
attack.text: This attack does 30 damage to each Pokemon that has any Poke-Powers (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Attract Current
attack.text: Search your deck for a {L} Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Splashing Turn
attack.text: You may switch Palkia [G] with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Pearl Breath
attack.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

pokebody.name: Iron Skull
pokebody.text: Rampardos's attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Head Smash
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon would be Knocked Out by this attack, Rampardos does 40 damage to itself.

attack.name: Mold Breaker
attack.text: Any damage done to Rampardos by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance) until the end of your next turn.

attack.name: Flower Aroma
attack.text: Remove 2 damage counters from Shaymin. The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Damage Aid
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 30 damage plus 50 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Growth
attack.text: Attach a {G} Energy card from your hand to Shaymin.

attack.name: Air Slash
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to Shaymin.

pokebody.name: Lazy Paunch
pokebody.text: If Slaking used any attacks during your last turn, Slaking can't attack.

attack.name: Best Dash
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Slaking by attacks is increased by 50 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Call for Family
attack.text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Pokemon SP and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Team Attack
attack.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Pokemon SP you have in play.

attack.name: Midnight Eyes
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Perish Song
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is Asleep and was damaged or affected by Midnight Eyes during your last turn, the Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out.

attack.name: Healing Song
attack.text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon.

pokepower.name: Temper Tantrum
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard as many cards as you like from your hand. If you do, put that many damage counters on Banette. This power can't be used if Banette is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Darkness Switch
attack.text: Discard an Energy card attached to Banette, and then switch all damage counters on Banette with those on the Defending Pokemon. (If an effect of this attack is prevented, this attack does nothing.)

attack.name: Loneliness
attack.text: You may show your hand to your opponent. If you do and if you don't have any Pokemon in your hand, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

pokebody.name: Metal Trait
pokebody.text: As long as Bastiodon has a Pokemon Tool attached to it, remove 1 damage counter from Bastiodon between turns.

attack.name: Iron Defense
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Bastiodon during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Iron Tackle
attack.text: Bastiodon does 30 damage to itself.

attack.name: Colorful Powder
attack.text: If Beautifly has 2 or less Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If Beautifly has 3 Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Poisoned. If Beautifly has 4 or more Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep, Burned, and Poisoned.

attack.name: Silver Scale
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Resistance, this attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.

pokepower.name: Nurse Call
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon. You can't use more than 1 Nurse Call Poke-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Blissey is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Return
attack.text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attack.name: Double-edge
attack.text: Blissey does 60 damage to itself.

attack.name: Energy Stream
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to Dialga.

attack.name: Diamond Blow
attack.text: Dialga can't attack during your next turn.

pokebody.name: Sinkhole
pokebody.text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon retreats, put 2 damage counters on that Pokemon.

attack.name: Push Down
attack.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Magnitude
attack.text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

pokebody.name: Camouflage Pattern
pokebody.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Dustox by your opponent's Pokemon that is affected by 2 or more Special Conditions.

attack.name: Smogscreen
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attack.name: Chemical Scale
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Poke-Powers or Poke-Bodies, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Confused.

attack.name: Knock Off
attack.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attack.name: Jet Smash
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 70 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Empoleon can't use Jet Smash during your next turn.

attack.name: Strafe
attack.text: You may switch Giratina with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Broken-space Blow
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out by this attack, put the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it in the Lost Zone instead of discarding them.

attack.name: Dragonbreath
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Swim
attack.text: If your opponent has any {W} Energy attached to any of his or her Pokemon, you may do 30 damage to any 1 Benched Pokemon instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Water Slide
attack.text: You may move all Energy cards attached to Golduck to 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Wriggle
attack.text: Flip a coin for each of your opponent's Pokemon. If that coin flip is heads, this attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Dwindling Wave
attack.text: Does 100 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Gyarados [G].

attack.name: Rushing Flames
attack.text: Discard as many {R} Energy as you like attached to your Pokemon in play. Flip a coin for each Energy card you discarded. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Rage
attack.text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Infernape.

attack.name: Revenge Melody
attack.text: Does 20 damage times the number of Kricketot and Kricketune in your discard pile.

attack.name: Bug Buzz
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is Asleep, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage. Remove the Special Condition Asleep from the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Harrumph
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to that Pokemon.

attack.name: Body Press
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

pokepower.name: Cheerful Voice
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. If you do, your turn ends. During your next turn, each of Ludicolo's attacks does 60 more damage to the Defending Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Mad Dance
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attack.name: Best Dance
attack.text: After doing damage, remove from Ludicolo the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon. Ludicolo can't use Best Dance during your next turn.

attack.name: Love Call
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. Search your deck for a Pokemon that is the same type as the Pokemon you chose, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Sweet Kiss
attack.text: Your opponent may draw a card.

attack.name: Flame Bash
attack.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. Search your deck for a number of {R} Energy cards up to the number of heads and attach them to any of your Pokemon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Mysterious Flames
attack.text: If you have more Energy in play than your opponent, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Confused.

attack.name: Tsunami
attack.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Water Pulse
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Energy Blow
attack.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Shaymin.

attack.name: Aromatherapy
attack.text: Remove 2 damage counters from each of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Green Blast
attack.text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each {G} Energy attached to all of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Soothing Scent
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

pokebody.name: Anticipation
pokebody.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, excluding damage, done to Toxicroak [G].

attack.name: Deep Poison
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon is Poisoned, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.

pokepower.name: Galactic Switch
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move an Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon SP to another of your Pokemon. Then, put 2 damage counters on Bronzong [G]. This power can't be used if Bronzong [G] is affected by a Special Condition.

attack.name: Psychic Pulse
Spike Wound
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 50 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Poison Experiment
attack.text: You may discard a {G} or {D} Energy attached to Cacturne. If you discard a {G} Energy, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If you discard a {D} Energy, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Stretch Vine
attack.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Absorb
attack.text: Remove 2 damage counters from Carnivine.

attack.name: Vine Extract
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Poisoned.

attack.name: Ascension
attack.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Cascoon and put it onto Cascoon. (This counts as evolving Cascoon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Poison Thread
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Firebreathing
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Rock Smash
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Knock Over
attack.text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

pokepower.name: Flash Bite
pokepower.text: Once during your turn, when you put Crobat [G] from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

attack.name: Toxic Fang
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokemon between turns.

attack.name: Spark
attack.text: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Tail Code
attack.text: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon to another of your opponent's Pokemon.

attack.name: Absorb
attack.text: Remove 1 damage counter from Grotle.

attack.name: Black Cry
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat or use any Poke-Powers during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Dark Slash
attack.text: You may discard a {D} Energy attached to Houndoom [G]. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Teleportation Burst
attack.text: You may switch Kirlia with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Interrupt
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attack.name: Aura Sphere
attack.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Do the Wave
attack.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokemon.

pokebody.name: Cold Feet
pokebody.text: If Mightyena is affected by a Special Condition, ignore all Energy necessary to use Mightyena's attacks.

attack.name: Collude
attack.text: If you played any Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Desperate Attack
attack.text: If Mightyena has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokemon, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

attack.name: Upper Hand
attack.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attack.name: Psybeam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attack.name: Fire Tail Slap
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a {R} Energy attached to Monferno.

attack.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

pokebody.name: Sludge Cell
pokebody.text: If Muk remains affected by any Special Conditions between turns, remove 2 damage counters from Muk.

attack.name: Strange Poison
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If tails, Muk is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Strange Sludge
attack.text: If Muk is Poisoned, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attack.name: Water Vein
attack.text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Flip a coin for each Energy card you find there. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads. Shuffle the revealed cards back into your deck.

attack.name: Octazooka
attack.text: Any time the Defending Pokemon tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, the attack does nothing. (If the Defending Pokemon is no longer your opponent's Active Pokemon, this effect ends.)

attack.name: Bubblebeam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Stealth Rock
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Hyper Beam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Shed Skin
attack.text: Remove 4 damage counters from Seviper.

attack.name: Bite and Escape
attack.text: You may switch Seviper with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Paralyze Poison
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attack.name: Endure
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, if Shieldon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, Shieldon is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attack.name: Rock Slide
attack.text: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Ascension
attack.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Silcoon and put it onto Silcoon. (This counts as evolving Silcoon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Sticky String
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Reckless Charge
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Vigoroth does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: Fight Back
attack.text: If Vigoroth has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Double Slap
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Rocket Tackle
attack.text: Wartortle does 10 damage to itself. Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Wartortle by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

pokebody.name: Thick Skin
pokebody.text: Zangoose can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attack.name: Invite and Strike
attack.text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Chop Up
Sneaky Attack
attack.text: If Cacnea has any {D} Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Shoot Needle
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon and this attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) (You can choose the same Pokemon more than once, but you can't do more than 10 damage to that Pokemon in this way.)

attack.name: Poison Breath
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

attack.name: Sweet Saliva
attack.text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Healing Trial
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 3 damage counters from Chansey. If tails, remove 3 damage counters from the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Pulled Punch
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 10 instead of 40.

attack.name: Collect
attack.text: Draw a card.

attack.name: Shoot Through
attack.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Dig Under
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attack.name: Trip Over
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Call for Family
attack.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Spring Out
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Roar
attack.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Thunder Fang
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Division
attack.text: Search your deck for Grimer and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Poison Gas
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

pokepower.name: Baby Evolution
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Chansey from your hand onto Happiny (this

attack.name: Hospitality
attack.text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. Remove 2 damage counters from the new Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Honcho's Command
attack.text: Search your deck for up to 2 in any combination of Stadium cards or Trainer cards that has Team Galactic's Invention in its name, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Target Attack
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. If that Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Lullaby
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Grind
attack.text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Lapras.

attack.name: Ice Beam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Stretch Tongue
attack.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attack.name: Knock Off
attack.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attack.name: Energy Ball
attack.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Lotad but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attack.name: Synthesis
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a {G} Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Minor Errand-Running
attack.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Expand
attack.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Mareep by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attack.name: Take Back
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

attack.name: Pull
attack.text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Muddy Water
attack.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Howl
attack.text: Search your deck for Poochyena and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Lunge
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Headache
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play any Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

attack.name: Latent Power
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does no damage to the Defending Pokemon. Instead, Psyduck is now Confused.

attack.name: Chip Off
attack.text: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in his or her hand, discard a number of cards without looking until your opponent has 5 cards left in his or her hand.

attack.name: Poor Sleep
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage and Purugly [G] is now Asleep.

attack.name: Future Sight
attack.text: Look at the top 5 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.

attack.name: Hypnoblast
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Trickle
attack.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Steady Punch
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attack.name: Hypnotic Gaze
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Fade Out
attack.text: Return Shuppet and all cards attached to it to your hand. (If you don't have any Benched Pokemon, this attack does nothing.)

attack.name: Heal Bell
attack.text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon.

attack.name: Take Down
attack.text: Skitty does 10 damage to itself.

pokepower.name: Poison Structure
pokepower.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Stadium card in play, you may use this power.

attack.name: Smokescreen
attack.text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attack.name: Flail
attack.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Slakoth.

attack.name: Slack Off
attack.text: Remove all damage counters from Slakoth. Slakoth can't attack during your next turn.

attack.name: Sing
attack.text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

attack.name: Run Around
attack.text: You may switch Swablu with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Show Off
attack.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Take Down
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Tauros does 10 damage to itself.

attack.name: Focus Energy
attack.text: During your next turn, Torchic's Fire Shard attack's base damage is 80.

attack.name: Fire Shard
attack.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attack.name: Super Singe
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

attack.name: Flame Ball
attack.text: Move an Energy card attached to Torkoal to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

attack.name: Body Slam
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Reheat
attack.text: Discard up to 2 Energy cards from your hand. For each card you discarded, draw 2 cards.

attack.name: Confuse Ray
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

attack.name: Poison Sting
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

stadium.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card. Each player may evolve a Pokemon that he or she just played or evolved during that turn.

supporter.text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokemon. When your turn ends, discard this card. Search your deck for a Supporter card, a basic Energy card, and a Trainer card that has Team Galactic's Invention in its name, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

stadium.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card. Whenever any player plays any Pokemon from his or her hand to evolve his or her Pokemon, put 2 damage counters on that Pokemon.

trainer.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokemon LV.X that levels up from 1 of your Pokemon, and put it onto that Pokemon. (This counts as leveling up that Pokemon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your Pokemon, and remove all Special Conditions and 6 damage counters from that Pokemon (all if there are less than 6).

supporter.text: You can play only one Supporter card each turn. When you play this card, put it next to your Active Pokemon. When your turn ends, discard this card. Look at your opponent's hand, then choose you or your opponent. That player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws up to 5 cards.

trainer.text: Attach Memory Berry to 1 of your Pokemon that doesn't already have a Pokemon Tool attached to it. If that Pokemon is Knocked Out, discard this card. The Pokemon this card is attached to can use any attack from its Basic Pokemon or its Stage 1 Evolution card. (You still have to pay for that attack's Energy cost.) Retreat Cost: n/a

stadium.text: This card stays in play when you play it. Discard this card if another Stadium card comes into play. If another card with the same name is in play, you can't play this card. Whenever any player puts a Basic Pokemon (excluding {G} or {P} Pokemon) from his or her hand onto his or her Bench, put 2 damage counters on that Pokemon.

trainer.text: Attach PlusPower to 1 of your Pokemon. Discard this card at the end of your turn. If the Pokemon PlusPower is attached to attacks, the attack does 10 more damage to the Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other card on the bottom of your deck.
Search your discard pile for a Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

card.uniqueName: Team Galactic's Invention G-101 Energy Gain
card.name: Team Galactic's Invention G-101 Energy Gain

trainer.text: Attach Team Galactic's Invention G-101 Energy Gain to 1 of your Pokemon SP that doesn't already have a Pokemon Tool attached to it. If that Pokemon is Knocked Out, discard this card. When the Pokemon this card is attached to is no longer a Pokemon SP, discard this card. As long as Team Galactic's Invention G-101 Energy Gain is attached to a Pokemon, the attack cost of that Pokemon's attacks is {C} less.

card.uniqueName: Team Galactic's Invention G-103 Power Spray
card.name: Team Galactic's Invention G-103 Power Spray

trainer.text: You may play this card during your opponent's turn when your opponent's Pokemon uses any Poke-Power. Prevent all effects of that Poke-Power. (This counts as that Pokemon using its Poke-Power.) If you have 2 or less Pokemon SP in play, you can't play this card.

card.uniqueName: Team Galactic's Invention G-105 Poke Turn
card.name: Team Galactic's Invention G-105 Poke Turn

trainer.text: Return 1 of your Pokemon SP and all cards attached to it to your hand.

Play Armor Fossil as if it were a {C} Basic Pokemon. (Armor Fossil counts as a Trainer card as well, but if Armor Fossil is Knocked Out, this counts as a Knocked Out Pokemon.) Armor Fossil can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat. At any time during your turn before your attack, you may discard Armor Fossil from play. (This doesn't count as a Knocked Out Pokemon.) [Poke-Body] Armor Stone Whenever Armor Fossil would be damaged by your opponent's attack, flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, reduce that damage by 10.

Play Skull Fossil as if it were a {C} Basic Pokemon. (Skull Fossil counts as a Trainer card as well, but if Skull Fossil is Knocked Out, this counts as a Knocked Out Pokemon.) Skull Fossil can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat. At any time during your turn before your attack, you may discard Skull Fossil from play. (This doesn't count as a Knocked Out Pokemon.) [Poke-Body] Skull Stone During your opponent's turn, if Skull Fossil would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokemon.

energy.text: Attach Rainbow Energy to 1 of your Pokemon. While in play, Rainbow Energy provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time. (Has no effect other than providing Energy.) When you attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon, put 1 damage counter on that Pokemon.

attack.name: Remove Lost
attack.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, remove an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon and put it in the Lost Zone.

attack.name: Sniping Tail
attack.text: Does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for

attack.name: Darkness Lost
attack.text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) If any of your opponent's Pokemon would be Knocked Out by damage from this attack, put that Pokemon and all cards attached to it in the Lost Zone instead of discarding it.

attack.name: Hydro Shot
attack.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Palkia [G]. Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 80 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Seed Flare
attack.text: Choose as many {G} Energy cards from your hand as you like and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each {G} Energy attached in this way.

attack.name: Energy Flare
attack.text: You may move any number of Energy cards attached to your Pokemon to your other Pokemon in any way you like.

attack.name: Thundershock
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

attack.name: Thunderpunch
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage. If tails, Electabuzz does 10damage to itself.

attack.name: Swords Dance
attack.text: During your next turn, Scyther's Slash attack's base damage is 60.

pokebody.name: Swift Swim
pokebody.text: If Lotad has any {W} Energy attached to it, Lotad's Retreat Cost is 0.

attack.name: Blot
attack.text: Remove 1 damage counter from Lotad.

attack.name: Jump On
attack.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attack.name: Roost
attack.text: Remove 4 damage counters from Swablu. Swablu can't retreat during your next turn.

attack.name: Mirror Move
attack.text: If Swablu was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does the same amount ofdamage done to Swablu to the Defending Pokemon.

attack.name: Fury Attack
attack.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attack.name: Find Wildfire
attack.text: Search your deck for up to 2 {R} Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into yourhand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attack.name: Brushfire
attack.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched {G} Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness andResistance for Benched Pokemon.)

attack.name: Inflame
attack.text: Discard a {R} Energy card from your hand. (If you can't discard a card from your hand, this attack doesnothing.)
